Title: Azure Update - 17th October 2025
Description:
A lot of really great updates this week!

🔎 Looking for content on a particular topic? Search the channel. If I have something it will be there! 🤔 Due to the channel growth and number of people wanting help I no longer can answer or even read questions and they will just stay in the moderation queue never to be seen so please post questions to other sites like Reddit, Microsoft Community Hub etc.

▬▬▬▬▬▬ C H A P T E R S ⏰ ▬▬▬▬▬▬ 00:00 - Introduction 00:08 - New videos 00:34 - Spot placement score 01:41 - Event Grid new capabilities 02:59 - Azure Functions flex updates 03:25 - Sharing capacity reservation 05:22 - VM SKU retirements 05:36 - Confidential containers on AKS retire 05:53 - Private Link Service Direct 07:04 - Azure Firewall observed capacity 07:17 - Azure Firewall prescaling 07:45 - Azure Storage Discovery 08:46 - Azure Databricks to SAP BDC 09:09 - DMS PowerShell and AZ cli 09:31 - Azure integrated HSM 10:06 - Custom Vision retire 10:34 - API Mgmt carbon footprint 10:58 - ASR Ultra Disk support 11:20 - GPT-image-1-mini 11:38 - Close
